title: No, America isn't going to help you make your children Christian
description:
​@Holy Post  with Josh Packard https://youtu.be/2D6E09_ICLI
Josh Packard links https://paulvanderklay.me/2021/12/17/progressive-evangelicals-unbundling-josh-packard/
David French Deconstructing White Evangelicalism https://frenchpress.thedispatch.com/p/deconstructing-white-evangelical
Muslim Evangelicals https://religioninpublic.blog/2021/03/02/whats-up-with-born-again-muslims-and-what-does-that-tells-us-about-american-religion/
Emilee VerDuin and Chris Petkau https://youtu.be/MKWH9XsgLtE
Emilee on my channel https://youtu.be/A0_gM9PBMaA
Rob Bell Fallen Fundamentalist https://www.lamag.com/culturefiles/fallen-fundamentalist-rob-bell-venice-beach/
Deseret News Young Christian Activists https://www.deseret.com/faith/2021/11/6/22752617/america-youth-religious-spiritual-mistrust-institutions-unaffiliated-social-justice-chris-stedman
Neil Shenvi in SBMW https://cbmw.org/2021/11/21/sociology-as-theology-the-deconstruction-of-power-in-postevangelical-scholarship/
Neil Shenvi Michael Bird spat https://shenviapologetics.com/a-friendly-response-to-mike-bird/
Will Willimon Making Christians in a Secular World https://www.religion-online.org/article/making-christians-in-a-secular-world/

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/6tswqT7Q
Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

My Substack https://paulvanderklay.substack.com/

Estuary Hub Link  https://www.estuaryhub.com/

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
